On Tuesday's #WorldTVDay 📺, see how the UN is sharing important & under-reported stories from around the world.
Online documentaries are here: https://t.co/25zXHwKX5n https://t.co/VebJ0cDqvf

Join @Refugees Goodwill Ambassador @KristinDavis & take urgent action for Rohingya refugee children.

Here's what you need to know & how you can help: https://t.co/SjNtU9gzoM https://t.co/0daKOJ7G20

Tuesday is #WorldTVDay 📺!

UN Video reports from all over the world, putting a human face to key issues of our time. Check it out: https://t.co/iIbGfu3t7A https://t.co/ZhLR9RL8Aj

Every child has the right to a safe, healthy, peaceful childhood & to develop to their full potential. 

The future peace of our 🌍 is in their hands. 

Join @antonioguterres & speak up for children's rights on Monday's #WorldChildrensDay and every day.

https://t.co/gN7Lan26Zy https://t.co/NqGrcdtfEq
On Tuesday's #WorldTVday we celebrate 📺 as a symbol for communication and globalization in the contemporary world. Details: https://t.co/czXOpoNmPx https://t.co/ymLjZBKlUw

As Monday's #WorldChildrensDay celebrates the anniversary of the Convention on the Rights of the Child, #KidsTakeOver to demand a better future for all.

See how YOU can get involved: https://t.co/pA4iP8bODR https://t.co/GrAPVXjH4e

Why is there a giant 🚽 in front of UN Headquarters in NYC? 

Find out here: https://t.co/PNzplfm5qW https://t.co/I31jCVPE3y

"Slavery has no place in our world" 

On situation of African migrants in Libya, @antonioguterres calls for enhanced international cooperation to stop human rights abuses.

https://t.co/lPtA4Igs3e https://t.co/taohqfDPKn

“One child,
one teacher,
one book,
one pen 
can change the world." -- @Malala

Join the #WorldChildrensDay celebrations & raise your voice for the rights of the child: https://t.co/Lb1JptqJdG https://t.co/9rb7NqRGN5

Happy #WorldChildrensDay!

Raise your voice and take action to help save children’s lives, fight for their rights and fulfill their potential: https://t.co/I1xcN2nTwK

 https://t.co/g1AWjLe0Ez

Monday’s Africa Industrialization Day focuses on growing Africa’s economy & supporting the eradication of poverty
https://t.co/8pSnmV8Dws https://t.co/vGwpIXnQOH

Monday #KidsTakeOver the 🌍 as we celebrate #WorldChildrensDay!

Let’s unite for children’s rights today & every day.

Join in:  https://t.co/OgA7fdplb8 https://t.co/HlEhZ2F5UU
What's happening this week at the UN? #WorldChildrensDay, Int'l Day to End Violence against Women & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/HDzhfjBd02 https://t.co/gN3187sKeq
Children deserve a better, more peaceful world. Here's how you can help achieve the #globalgoals https://t.co/JHoTkXTbCp #WorldChildrensDay https://t.co/xIj8uxeyng
Starts this week in @UNGeneva: Committee on the Elimination of Racial Discrimination https://t.co/9eK91JROUQ #FightRacism https://t.co/QerlgCkVmb

Our children.
Our future.

Special events are taking place on Monday, #WorldChildrensDay,  to make children’s voices heard across the 🌎 → https://t.co/4G8uXjsv8L … https://t.co/3uxKgnnU3h

🎶 “What About Us?” 🎶

Check out this #KidsTakeover @Pink remix for #WorldChildrensDay https://t.co/OgA7fdGW2G via @UNICEF https://t.co/evaihaulrr
Want to help those in Yemen? Your donation to @WFP will be immediately put to work saving lives. Here is how: https://t.co/k5PxE2bv14 via @WFPChief https://t.co/FdTvdEXH0P
This week Canada launched the "Elsie Initiative" to help develop of a systematic approach to deploy more women in @UNPeacekeeping operations. See why: https://t.co/T8o6WWAZVy https://t.co/GuOsZLY4p1

What do M&Ms and @UNPeacekeeping have in common?

Hint: cocoa beans from Cote d’Ivoire where UN Peacekeepers helped maintain stability.

Learn more via @unfoundation here: https://t.co/Tj5XXpHZBM https://t.co/QCRoSt7K66

Sunday is World Day of Remembrance for Road Traffic Victims.

Road traffic injuries are a global public health problem. Join the efforts to reduce road casualties & help achieve the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/0y2EcfLLaG https://t.co/xYFHm3Tnsx

Each day, ~1,000 children die due to preventable water & sanitation-related diseases.

On Sunday's #WorldToiletDay see how #GlobalGoals aim to ensure everyone has access to a safely-managed household 🚽 by 2030: https://t.co/6DwQJNQyFj https://t.co/ogZ6eqBrxu

3,400 people die on the road every day.

On Sunday's World Day of Remembrance for Road Traffic Victims, see ways we can reduce this number: https://t.co/XZqTVWko84 https://t.co/lX8OroXMLX

Sunday's #WorldToiletDay focuses on recycling & safe reuse of wastewater which can be affordable & sustainable source of energy, nutrients and water.

More on the Day: https://t.co/zcs8PiJ82j https://t.co/KKZduTMz7P

Arabic @UNarabic

Thanks to  @UNVolunteers from around the 🌎 for working hard to help make last week's UN Climate Conference #COP23 a success! https://t.co/jdGY3Cjssk https://t.co/FTwEeUrgGd

For billions of people around the 🌏, sanitation systems are either non-existent or ineffective.
Learn more about tackling the global sanitation crisis on Sunday's #WorldToiletDay: https://t.co/KayLIqvsPB https://t.co/MHNXnLbAWE
See how you can help feed the hungry in Lebanon & around the 🌎 here: https://t.co/q2ILhuVgif https://t.co/xdOcy7PZwr

We must address messages of hate with 
inclusivity, 
diversity, 
and the protection of minorities and vulnerable people. https://t.co/tgqjLiMene
The UN Climate Conference #COP23 finished on Saturday, but this 12-year-old from Fiji's message will stick with attendees for a long time. https://t.co/wv4yXn7sYg
The UN Climate Conference #COP23 wrapped up in Germany this week, having produced many new climate action initiatives, commitments & partnerships: https://t.co/LLVWYKuFyP https://t.co/08STYGYypN

The UN Climate Conference #COP23 ended on Saturday. Here are some highlights of the last two weeks in Bonn, Germany ⬇️

https://t.co/X3wizeHAGm

“Have we become unable to broker peace?”
See why @RefugeesChief asked this question when he addressed the UN Security Council & urged more action to protect refugees⬇️

https://t.co/a8ptwtoY7U

There is, today, a critical window of opportunity to build fundamental human rights & values into future technologies & ecosystems -@UNhumanrights cheif Zeid on digital rights https://t.co/NFbIKo7Bxo https://t.co/cbt2XUUfoA

Investing in climate-friendly development is where the smart money is headed - @antonioguterres called for increased climate action at this week's #COP23: https://t.co/BEtxb8db8E https://t.co/uvsHhoq83u
.@bertrandpiccard supports the #GlobalGoals & gives us ideas for climate action. Watch his interview at this week's UN Climate Conference #COP23: https://t.co/VRMnUanoUn https://t.co/vxuhWnZftz

.@antonioguterres calls for cooperation in cracking down on smugglers & traffickers, protecting victims & opening opportunities for regular migration. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/8O5Ohe2TmI
Starting now: @antonioguterres speaks at Security Council meeting on security challenges in the Mediterranean. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmUzNN
Preventing deaths and complications from preterm birth starts with a healthy pregnancy  https://t.co/sUwEm0GEL9 https://t.co/Ggb3eSen8s

"I want the whole world to know that climate change is real. It's like a thief in the night. It not only steals, but kills and destroys." -- Timoci, 12, who spoke to world leaders at #COP23. 

Join him & take climate action now: https://t.co/kYprx1ZwM1
 https://t.co/k7ozbx9Oo5
https://t.co/CU55AoOeVF
This week 50+ countries endoresed the #VancouverPrinciples to prevent recruitment & use of child soldiers at #PeaceConf17. A new Q&A is online here: https://t.co/xFhQAwhZS5 https://t.co/yQDyQG6pM0
#GlobalGoals are the world's shared blueprint for peace, prosperity & dignity for all and a powerful antidote to some of the causes of terrorism -@antonioguterres https://t.co/DKHa40zybY
The UN is the right place for nations & civil society to tackle climate change - German Environment Minister Barbara Hendricks at #COP23 https://t.co/UB3ld7fhE5
Major new pledges to bolster @UNpeacekeeping made at #PeaceConf17 in Vancouver this week – @Lacroix_UN https://t.co/G7FzFCqLUo https://t.co/oZjpxzLREb

Many of Yemen's air, sea and land entry points are closed.

The UN calls for immediate lifting of blockade.

We need to deliver vital supplies of medicine & food to those trapped in "worst humanitarian crisis in the world" https://t.co/XSQ3LcCNv5

Let's nurture tolerance and respect the diversity that makes us strong & the values that bring us together.

Thursday is Intl Day #ToleranceDay: https://t.co/bX5UjyhNc5 https://t.co/QnvGaILNGY
Zimbabwe: @antonioguterres underlines importance of resolving political differences through peaceful means. https://t.co/ovLDhBxFt5

Do you have a favourite philosopher?

Thursday is #PhilosophyDay -- an opportunity to highlight the importance of critical thinking to find new ways of living together and building fairer societies.

More on the Day from @UNESCO here: https://t.co/NW4yAec46A https://t.co/itW5Ih5Lih
All the climate action at #COP23 impressed @ESA astronaut @astro_timpeake. Here's how you help save the world: https://t.co/6cUKSXiPBo https://t.co/lryi1ob3L1

Terrorism is fundamentally the denial and destruction of human rights. The fight against terrorism will never succeed by perpetuating the same denial and destruction. -@antonioguterres #UNatSOAS https://t.co/c7SwbvWigr

We have a responsibility to base our narratives on facts, and avoid doing the terrorists’ work for them by demonising & stigmatising certain groups - @antonioguterres #UNatSOAS https://t.co/YKVLtCp9eF

We must resist stereotyping and seeing vast communities as monoliths if we are to
develop effective ways to fight this menace.
-@antonioguterres on human rights & counter-terrorism #UNatSOAS

We must win the battle of ideas.
We should never shrink from pointing out the cynicism and errors of terrorism.
- @AntonioGuterres #UNatSOAS https://t.co/4QMSS15jt7
Watch Secretary-General @antonioguterres’ speech live at 5pm UK time here: https://t.co/caVjyaZugA #UNatSOAS https://t.co/y3vPS0APS8
Philosophy creates the intellectual conditions for change, #GlobalGoals and peace. Thursday is World #PhilosophyDay: https://t.co/VBYDTiAQW7 https://t.co/NoxA0gP0im
At #COP23 musician & @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador @SuzannaOwiyo has a climate action idea 💡: let's reduce our food waste! https://t.co/aBxcTFTM6j

For a more peaceful 🌍, stand up inclusion and respect towards all people. 
Thursday is Intl #ToleranceDay: https://t.co/JrHny7LVau #GlobalGoals https://t.co/tDGxsB6cOS
Join us in thanking the 40+ countries which made new pledges to @UNPeacekeeping at #PeaceConf17. See all the commitments here. https://t.co/bTzqybo1os

Through philosophy we can better understand the world and contribute to the #GlobalGoals.
Thursday is World Philosophy Day: https://t.co/VBYDTiSskH https://t.co/uet2gYTkCs
.@UNPeacekeeping personnel work w/ courage & dedication in some of the most dangerous places in the world. #PeaceCon17 update on Mali is here: https://t.co/hQiNVNk7UZ https://t.co/RdDK2lljTl

5 ways to counter intolerance:

Laws
Education
Information
Individual awareness
Local solutions

Thursday is Intl #ToleranceDay: https://t.co/LACZUVyVxL https://t.co/hrjCHjrvW4
#PeaceConf17 is calling attention the @UNPeacekeeping work to help the vulnerable & build a more peaceful world. Here are some Twitter highlights.  https://t.co/usVHfQusH3
Thursday's #PhilosophyDay celebrates importance of reflection & critical thinking. Details: https://t.co/VBYDTiSskH https://t.co/uFx27JT0Bk

Only one ambition matters: build a secure world of peace, dignity & opportunity for all on a healthy planet. 

-- @antonioguterres at UN Climate Change Conference #COP23

More: https://t.co/0yeQeoTY8U https://t.co/ohm8kdwFdP

"There is no greater gift that we can leave our children and our grandchildren than true and lasting peace" - @CanadianPM @JustinTrudeau at #PeaceConf17 https://t.co/WWl1BXEbQh https://t.co/Jyapdo7vL9

On Thursday's Intl Day for Tolerance & every day, let’s #JoinTogether to promote tolerance, respect and dignity for all. 

Info on the Day: https://t.co/xc9iaRNRIb https://t.co/3WWcadlFtt
Watch now: @Refugees Special Envoy Angelina Jolie is at #PeaceConf17 advocating for the right for women & girls to live a life free of violence. See: https://t.co/LwPgUHaCvl https://t.co/3SkIL45xR1

South Africa's Major Seitebatso Pearl Block has won this year's Gender Military Advocate Award for her outstanding work w/ @UNPeacekeeping. Details here: https://t.co/QZ14xkDJfk #PeaceConf17 https://t.co/FaBF8mFO2k

Has your country endorsed the “Vancouver Principles” aimed to help prevent the recruitment & use of child soldiers? Get the list & more details here: https://t.co/1YXq0ivw4R #PeaceConf17 https://t.co/rFVoEBYQbF

"Today’s @UNPeacekeeping is different […] Most of our  operations are deployed in much more challenging environments." @Lacroix_UN at #PeaceConf17. "We can overcome these challenges, but we cannot do it alone. We need support. We need your support." https://t.co/3Yl63Ohm9y https://t.co/IZ8J6tRCKx

"We ask a lot of men and women who serve in @UNPeacekeeping operations but we don’t give them the tools to succeed" - @JustinTrudeau, #PeaceConf17 is here: https://t.co/C2mBedu2XW https://t.co/KTjlwFrByy
Investing in women’s economic empowerment = action for #Planet5050. https://t.co/OE4usKoe4s https://t.co/7n3U2VLAx4

.@antonioguterres to world leaders at UN Climate Conference: I can think of no greater way to show your people that you care for the well-being of your citizens than to claim the mantle of climate leadership. #COP23 https://t.co/kkSAy33Efc
Lowering emissions does not stifle growth, high emissions are not the unavoidable cost of progress - @antonioguterres #COP23 https://t.co/W6E22hKK7o
.@antonioguterres calls for more ambition in five areas of climate action: cutting emissions, adaptation, finance, partnerships & leadership. #COP23 https://t.co/JavuhvFF0I

Starting now: @antonioguterres speaks at the UN Climate Change Conference #COP23. 

Watch live: https://t.co/d6kf9mnEAx https://t.co/0pjCAYk3ln
Static @UNpeacekeeping tasks are a thing of the past. See how things are changing & how #PeaceConf17 is harnessing pledges for the future https://t.co/pj0sjqOvEQ https://t.co/MA930zvGhp
.@antonioguterres arrives at UN Climate Conference #COP23 stressing the urgency for climate action https://t.co/RvEdzxStef

Antibiotic resistance is an increasingly serious threat to global health and human development.

During 🌍 Antibiotic Awareness Week, find out how YOU can help prevent #AntibioticResistance: https://t.co/t12xRBXPv0 https://t.co/WnYPrOPvGx
The largest solar plant ever built in a refugees camp went live on Monday! It will provide free energy to 80K Syrian refugees & save $500K a month. https://t.co/hJZnC6Yzbg https://t.co/JblWmm5AKA
The contributions of young people are vital to creating a meaningful & just peace. #PeaceConf17 is focusing on @UNPeacekeeping, #GlobalGoals + more https://t.co/awwWJdHMhW

We will never reach #ZeroHunger as long as we have man-made conflict. End the wars, end the conflicts -- and we will end world hunger. 
- @WFPchief David Beasley https://t.co/VJdIcGMcZd

#PeaceConf17 is underway in Vancouver 🇨🇦. See highlights from @UNPeacekeeping, @CanadianForces, @OIFfrancophonie 
 & more https://t.co/usVHfQcRPv
Meet the girls in Nepal who are using cricket 🏏 to help #EndChildMarriage thanks to this @UNFPA tournament. https://t.co/GVozI3uq7f

.@UNPeacekeeping works in complex & dangerous environments. #PeaceConf17 is calling for essential equipment & latest technology to implement mandates in places like Mali: https://t.co/Oj5zGYf7eW  https://t.co/Bm9aIm83gy

“The suffering of migrants detained in Libya is an outrage to the conscience of humanity.” -- @UNHumanRights Chief. 

Learn more on the situation in Libya: https://t.co/bTXH7gwc7H https://t.co/AR3aHYbcvf
Young people are key for peace & security. #PeaceConf17 is now underway in Vancouver! https://t.co/C2mBedcs6o #Youth4Peace https://t.co/r8rUVah77b
At #COP23 we celebrate climate action from youth. Hear from one of the @UNVolunteers why climate action matters & read more: https://t.co/LLVWYKMgqn https://t.co/PQWtXjP1MQ
#PeaceConf17 is mobilizing countries to make & maintain pledges to life-saving @UNPeacekeeping operations https://t.co/9yhXiLD0VO https://t.co/281OjljJCb

The obstruction of access to adequate health care for ~350,000 civilians is a clear and repugnant violation of the right to health -@UNhumanrights experts https://t.co/3pnnvNlzzU

205M women live with diabetes worldwide. 

On Tuesday's #WorldDiabetesDay, see how @WHO works for women's right to a healthy future: https://t.co/UlLsgC0hQj https://t.co/sltUvZPZkv
